std::vector< long > SpinachSpinsys::getNearbySpins ( long  spinNumber,
double  distance 
)

Get all spins within distance of spin spinNumber with a higher number than spinNumber (useful for drawing bonds. If you loop though the structure, you only need to draw a bond once)
